charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1101_0100_20:
Chili and [Name:PlayerNickname ] were
training in the forest.
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_0200_10:
That training session was FIRE! Let’s take a
short break over here!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_0300_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Wanna
try one of Simisear’s seared Berries?
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_0400_10:
They’re cooked just right—not charred,
not raw!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_0500_10: They should be seared to perfection!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_0401_0700_10:
Well, we always cook Berries whenever we
rest like this!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_0402_0900_10: Yeah! I guarantee they’ll be tasty!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1000_10:
One of my goals when I’m training with
Simisear is to find the perfect temperature!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1100_10:
Hm? Oh, you wanna know what my other
goals are?
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1200_10:
Well...one is to change people’s perception
of me and my brothers!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1300_10:
Unlike others, we’re still new to being
Gym Leaders.
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1400_10:
Because of that, we’re often treated as if
the three of us make one full-fledged
Trainer.
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1500_10: I wanna get stronger and prove that wrong!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1600_10:
Cilan and Cress have been training on Pasio
too, so I can’t fall behind!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1700_10:
Man, when I start talking about my brothers,
I get antsy!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_1800_10: Break time’s over! Let’s have another battle!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_2100_10: I got a bit too heated!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_2300_10: And of course you too, Simisear!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_2400_10: Hm... Did I push you too hard today?
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_2500_10:
Hahaha! Looks like you’re still raring to go!
But let’s not go so hard we burn out, OK?
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_2600_10:
I’ve gotta shake my habit of getting tunnel
vision when I’m all fired up!
charaepi_ch0145_00_pod/2301_1201_2700_10:
I guess when I’m training, I should find the
perfect temperature for myself, too!
